channel.title: Help?
channel.description: You know how in runescape when you play you can choose to play music how do you do that in the game? For example when they play they can play music off your machine?

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Well you can put your own music into the moparscape client. You could probably put it into a 317 as well. You would have to make an options bar though.

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @ss_Boring_ss Boring_
item.description:
@ss_Boring_ss wrote:

Is there really a reason to have music? You can listen to music off your MoparScape webclient. Enless you have a media player [eg.Itunes] or any other music player, use that. Enless you have some special relationship with RuneScape sounds, hopefully you donâ€™t -.-

Read full topic
